title: EP 120: Laws of Distraction
itunes:title: EP 120: Laws of Distraction
description:
On this episode The Hood Postman Melly Mel pops in and Big James speaks on the Charles White incident. We then have an in depth convo about reactionary content and why the hood better wake up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
